name: React Component Generator
description: Generate type-safe React components with proper TypeScript interfaces, styling, and test files.
author: Agency Core Team

files.description: Main skill definition and usage instructions
files.content:
# React Component Generator

Generate React components with TypeScript, proper props interfaces, and accompanying test files.

## Usage

Ask your AI assistant to create a component:

```
Create a Button component with primary and secondary variants
```

## Output

- Component file with TypeScript
- Props interface
- CSS module or styled-components
- Unit test file

name: API Route Builder
description: Scaffold Next.js API routes with validation, error handling, and proper TypeScript types.
author: Agency Core Team

files.content:
# API Route Builder

Create Next.js API routes with built-in validation using Zod.

## Features

- Request/response type safety
- Zod schema validation
- Error handling middleware
- Rate limiting support

name: Prisma Schema Generator
description: Design and generate Prisma schemas with relations, indexes, and migration scripts.
author: Agency Core Team

files.content:
# Prisma Schema Generator

Generate Prisma schemas with proper relations and indexes.

## Capabilities

- Entity relationship modeling
- Index optimization
- Migration generation
- Seed data scripts

name: Tailwind UI Builder
description: Create responsive, accessible UI components using Tailwind CSS best practices.
author: Agency Core Team

files.content:
# Tailwind UI Builder

Build responsive, accessible components with Tailwind.

## Features

- Mobile-first responsive design
- Dark mode support
- ARIA accessibility
- Animation utilities

name: Jest Test Writer
description: Generate comprehensive Jest test suites with mocking, coverage, and snapshot testing.
author: Agency Core Team

files.content:
# Jest Test Writer

Generate comprehensive test suites with proper mocking.

## Capabilities

- Unit test generation
- Mock factory creation
- Snapshot testing
- Coverage optimization

name: Docker Compose Generator
description: Create Docker Compose configurations for development and production environments.
author: Agency Core Team

files.content:
# Docker Compose Generator

Generate Docker Compose files for multi-container apps.

## Features

- Service orchestration
- Volume management
- Network configuration
- Environment separation
